Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: loads \loads\ n. A large quantity; a lot; as, loads of fun. [informal] [PJC]

loads n : a large number or amount; "made lots of new friends"; "she amassed a mountain of newspapers" [syn: {tons}, {dozens}, {heaps}, {lots}, {mountain}, {piles}, {scores}, {stacks}, {rafts}, {slews}, {wads}, {oodles}, {gobs}, {scads}, {lashings}]
